Netflix Documentaries

If you have some time to kill, don’t forget to watch the following documentaries:

  • Machead for Apple fanboys
  • The Dungeon Masters for D&D players
  • Modify enhancing your body

Update: 2012-10-17

Last night I got the chance to see Indie Game: The Movie and it would be wrong not to mention this one. It’s definitely worth it.
